alert.note: Alert for Camden (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 25 at 4:19PM EDT until July 25 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM EDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL CAMDEN AND NORTHWESTERN BURLINGTON COUNTIES... At 418 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Willingboro, or 12 miles northeast of Camden, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Wind damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. Locations impacted include... Mount Laurel, Willingboro, Medford, Lumberton, Florence, Burlington, Bristol, Mount Holly, Riverside, Palmyra, Bordentown, Beverly, Tullytown, Pemberton, Wrightstown, Ramblewood, Florence-Roebling, Cherry Hill Mall, Leisuretowne and Jacksonville. This includes the following highways... New Jersey Turnpike between exits 4 and 7A. Interstate 295 in New Jersey between mile markers 36 and 58. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
